meanings.definition: The quality or state of being miscellaneous.
meanings.sent1: The miscellaneousness of the items in the box made it hard to find what I was looking for.
meanings.sent2: Her desk was a perfect example of miscellaneousness, with papers and pens scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The party game involved guessing the miscellaneousness of objects blindfolded, leading to hilarious results.
meanings.sent4: In the chaos of the garage sale, the miscellaneousness of items seemed to take on a life of its own.
meanings.sent5: The professor's office was a testament to the miscellaneousness of his interests, with books on every subject imaginable.

meanings.sent1: The box contained a miscellaneousness of trinkets and souvenirs from her travels.
meanings.sent2: The garage sale had a wide variety of items, showcasing the miscellaneousness of the offerings.
meanings.sent3: The children's toy chest was a colorful display of miscellaneousness, filled with toys of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a beautiful display of nature's miscellaneousness, with flowers of different colors and shapes.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit highlighted the historical miscellaneousness of artifacts from different time periods.
